name: TinyPopEditor

auto-lookup.description: Whether data is automatically requested at initialization
auto-lookup.description_zh: 初始化时是否自动请求数据

auto-reset.description: After filtering, click Close to automatically reset the filter criteria
auto-reset.description_zh: 筛选后点击关闭是否自动重置筛选条件

before-close.description: You can configure a method to close the blocking pop-up window. If the method returns a false value, the interception pop-up window is closed, otherwise it is not blocked
before-close.description_zh: 可以配置一个拦截弹窗关闭的方法。如果方法返回 false 值，则拦截弹窗关闭，否则不拦截

conditions.description: If the pop-up panel is configured with a table, set the form query items in the pop-up panel
conditions.description_zh: 当弹出面板配置的是表格时，设置弹出面板中的表单查询项

dialog-class.description: Customize the class name of the pop-up window

draggable.description: Sets whether the pop-up window is draggable
draggable.description_zh: 设置弹出窗口是否可拖动

grid-op.description: Set the configuration information of the table component in the pop-up panel
grid-op.description_zh: 设置弹出面板中表格组件的配置信息

icon.description: Customize the icon at the end of the selection box
icon.description_zh: 自定义选择框尾部图标

multi.description: Sets whether the data in the pop-up panel can be multi-selected
multi.description_zh: 设置弹出面板中的数据是否可多选

popseletor.description: Sets the tree or table components that can be displayed in the pop-up panel
popseletor.description_zh: 设置弹出面板中可显示的树或者表格组件

radio-change-close.description: Select whether to close the pop-up window when selected
radio-change-close.description_zh: 单选选中后是否关闭弹窗

readonly.description: Set whether to read-only, set [3.0] to false, and click the Input box to pop up the selection box
readonly.description_zh: 设置是否只读，【3.0】设置为 false 后点击 Input 框可以弹出选择框

resize.description: Whether to display the full-screen button in the pop-up box
resize.description_zh: 是否显示弹框全屏按钮

selected-box-op.description: 通过属性 selected-box-op 指定 SelectedBox 组件配置,可以把已选表格显示为已选栏
selected-box-op.description_zh: 通过属性 selected-box-op 指定 SelectedBox 组件配置,可以把已选表格显示为已选栏

show-clear-btn.description: Sets whether to display a clear button on the right side of the input box
show-clear-btn.description_zh: 设置输入框中右侧是否显示清除按钮

show-history.description: When the pop-up panel is configured with a table, set whether the table is displayed on the History tab
show-history.description_zh: 当弹出面板配置的是表格时，设置历史记录标签页是否显示表格

show-selected-box.description: For multi-select scenes, whether to display the selected table as a selected column
show-selected-box.description_zh: 多选场景，是否将已选表格显示为已选栏

suggest.description: Configure suggest to enable the prediction function, which will automatically trigger the prediction query after entering the input box, which needs to be used in conjunction with remote-search
suggest.description_zh: 配置 suggest 开启联想功能，输入框输入后自动触发联想查询，该功能需要联合 remote-search 使用

tabindex.description: Set the order of focus gain via the Tab key (valid when the readonly property is set to false)
tabindex.description_zh: 设置通过 Tab 键获焦及获焦顺序（readonly 属性设置为 false 时有效）

text-field.description: Set the field to display the text in the input box, and the displayed text will not be submitted when data is submitted
text-field.description_zh: 设置输入框中显示文本的字段，提交数据时，不提交该显示文本

text-split.description: In the case of multiple selections, set the separator when multiple data is to be displayed in the input box
text-split.description_zh: 在多选的情况下，设置输入框中要显示多个数据时的分隔符

title.description: Set the title of the pop-up panel and support internationalization
title.description_zh: 设置弹出面板的标题，并且支持国际化

trigger.description: The pop-up table shows the selected configuration of radio when radio is selected, configurable: default (default), cell (click on the cell to trigger), row (click on the row to trigger)
trigger.description_zh: 弹框表格中为单选时 radio 的选中配置，可配置：default（默认）, cell（点击单元格触发）, row（点击行触发）

value-field.description: Set the fields in the input box to submit data
value-field.description_zh: 设置输入框要提交数据的字段

value-split.description: In the case of multiple selection, set the separator when the input box is to submit multiple data
value-split.description_zh: 在多选的情况下，设置输入框要提交多个数据时的分隔符

width.description: Set the width of the popup panel in pixels, with a minimum width of 900px when the component's multi = true, and a minimum width of 600px otherwise
width.description_zh: 设置弹出面板的宽度（单位像素），当组件的 multi = true 时，宽度最小为 900px，否则宽度最小为 600px

typeDetail.IRemoteSearch: type IRemoteSearch = ({ page: { currentPage: number, pageSize: number }, conditions: { [K in IConditions['field']]: string } }) => void

events.name: change
events.description: 数据发生变化的事件，commitValue 为选中数据的索引（value-field 配置的字段），selectedDatas 为选中的数据项
events.description_zh: 数据发生变化的事件，commitValue 为选中数据的索引（value-field 配置的字段），selectedDatas 为选中的数据项

events.name: close
events.description: An event that is triggered when the pop-up box is closed
events.description_zh: 弹框关闭时触发的事件

events.name: page-change
events.description: In the tabular mode pagination switching event, page is the page number of the pagination switch
events.description_zh: 表格模式分页切换事件，page 为分页切换页码

events.name: popup
events.description: An event that is triggered when a pop-up box is opened
events.description_zh: 弹框打开时触发的事件

description: 该组件只能在弹出的面板中选择数据，不能手动输入数据；弹出面板中显示为 Tree 组件或者 Grid 组件。
description_zh: 该组件只能在弹出的面板中选择数据，不能手动输入数据；弹出面板中显示为 Tree 组件或者 Grid 组件。
